ui.welcome: Welcome to the unofficial interactive map and timeline of Brandon Sanderson's *The Stormlight Archive* series of books!
ui.disclaimerText:

start.name: Start
start.explanation: This is one year in the Rosharan calendar.

day.name: Day
day.explanation: Each day is 20 Rosharan hours long.

month.name: Month
month.explanation: Each month spans 50 days, or 10 weeks.

year.name: Year
year.explanation: A year amounts to 10 months, 100 weeks, or 500 days.

date.name: Dates
date.explanation:
Dates are written as the year first, month second, week third, and day last. The numbers are separated by periods.

For example, this date in year 1173 is written: {date}

adolin-begins-dueling.name: Adolin begins dueling
adolin-begins-dueling.blurb: Adolin began dueling Shardbearers to win Shards for House Kholin.
adolin-begins-dueling.details: After being named Highprince of War, Dalinar continued struggling to unite the stubborn Alethi highprinces against the Parshendi. To force them into submission, Dalinar asked Adolin to begin dueling competitively. Over the following weeks, Adolin was able to secure several Shards for House Kholin.

adolin-is-born.name: Adolin is born
adolin-is-born.details: Adolin was born to Dalinar and Evi Kholin.

adolin-murders-sadeas.name: Adolin murders Sadeas
adolin-murders-sadeas.blurb: Adolin encountered Sadeas alone in the halls of Urithiru and murdered him upon provocation.
adolin-murders-sadeas.details: While exploring the halls of Urithiru days after residiscovery of the city, Adolin encountered Sadeas alone. After Adolin revealed his presence, Sadeas made smug threats against the Kholins. This prompted a sudden and violent response from Adolin, leaving Sadeas dead with a dagger through one eye.

amarams-arrival.name: Amaram's arrival
amarams-arrival.blurb: Amaram arrived on the Shattered Plains.
amarams-arrival.details: Amaram arrived on the Shattered Plains shortly after the Battle of the Tower, with secretive plans relating to his involvement with the Sons of Honor. His arrival caused Kaladin to doubt Dalinar's honor and drove a wedge in their relationship for a time.

ashyn-exodus.name: Ashyn Exodus
ashyn-exodus.blurb: Fleeing the destruction of their homeworld, humans from Ashyn settled in Shinovar.
ashyn-exodus.details:
> They came from another world, using powers that we have been forbidden to touch. Dangerous powers, of spren and Surges. They destroyed their lands and have come to us begging.We took them in, as commanded by the gods. What else could we do? They were a people forlorn, without a home. Our pity destroyed us.
> —From the Eila Stele
Fleeing the destruction of their homeworld, humans from Ashyn, travelled by magical means to Roshar. At the prompting of the Shards, Honor and Cultivation, the native singers welcomed the humans, who initially settled in Shinovar.

battle-of-kholinar.name: Battle of Kholinar
battle-of-kholinar.blurb: The singers attacked and seized Kholinar. Elhokar is killed. F*** Moash.
battle-of-kholinar.details: The singer forces laying seige to Kholinar attacked on the day Elhokar's team attempted to open the Oathgate. Elhokar's team failed after Moash killed the Alethi king and Kaladin, Shallan, Adolin, and Azure were stranded in Shadesmar. The singer assult was successful.

battle-of-narak-and-the-everstorm.name: Battle of Narak
battle-of-narak-and-the-everstorm.blurb: The Everstorm was summoned as Alethi armies faced off with the listeners at the Battle of Narak.
battle-of-narak-and-the-everstorm.details: The Alethi forces led by Dalinar Kholin arrived at Narak on the final day of Renarin's cryptic countdown. A battle ensued as the stormform listener forces worked to summon the Everstorm. The Alethi proved victorious, but the Everstorm's arrival nearly wiped out all survivors.

battle-of-the-tower.name: Battle of the Tower
battle-of-the-tower.blurb: Kaladin saved Dalinar and Adolin's forces after betrayal at the hands of Sadeas.
battle-of-the-tower.details: Dalinar and Sadeas arranged a joint plateau run to the infamous plateau known as 'the Tower', where no Alethi army had yet proven victorious. As Dalinar's forces became engaged, Sadeas betrayed Dalinar, withdrawing his troops and leaving Dalinar surrounded. Kaladin and Bridge Four returned to the plateau, giving Dalinar, Adolin, and a remnant of their forces an opportunity to escape.

boots.name: Boots!
boots.blurb: Shallan and Kaladin met for the first time, with Shallan pretending to be a Horneater princess.
boots.details: Unsure of the loyalties of an approaching group of soldiers, and at the prompting of Tyn, Shallan impersonated Horneater royalty at her first meeting with Kaladin on the outskirts of the Shattered Plains. She demanded, and received, his boots in payment for a feigned slight.

bridge-four-begins-training-squires.name: Bridge Four begins training squires
bridge-four-begins-training-squires.blurb: After Kaladin returned to Urithiru, Bridge Four began training Bridge Four as Windrunner squires. Rock's family arrived on the Shattered Plains.
bridge-four-begins-training-squires.details: After Kaladin returned from his mission in Alethkar, he began to see to the development of the growing Windrunners. Several members of Bridge Four showed signs of being Kaladin's squires, and in the coming weeks most of the crew, as well as some newcomers, would also take the steps to become squires or full Windrunners.

bridge-four-begins-training.name: Bridge Four spear training
bridge-four-begins-training.blurb: Kaladin began training the bridge crew to fight with the spear in order to escape.
bridge-four-begins-training.details: After the disaster with the attempt to protect the bridge crew with the 'side carry' maneuver, Kaladin was left with the hopeless realization that protecting the men would ultimately prove impossible. On the day Rlain was assigned to Bridge Four, the crew was assigned chasm duty. Finding a spear in the chasms, Kaladin determined that Bridge Four's only option was to try fighting their way to freedom

chasmfiend-hunt-disaster.name: Chasmfiend hunt disaster
chasmfiend-hunt-disaster.blurb: Elhokar was saved by Dalinar when his saddle strap broke during a Chasmfiend hunt gone wrong.
chasmfiend-hunt-disaster.details: Dalinar and several highprinces attended Elhokar on a hunting party out onto the Shattered Plains. Upon arriving at their destination, where a small chasmfiend was to be baited, an enormous chasmfiend found its way onto the adjacent plateau, catching the party by surprise. While attacking the beast, Elhokar's saddle strap broke, leaving him vulnerable before the greatshell. Dalinar held the chasmfiend back and they ultimately slew the monster. The broken saddle strap led to an investigation into an aleged assassination attempt.

dalinar-and-navani-are-married.name: Dalinar and Navani are married
dalinar-and-navani-are-married.blurb: Dalinar and Navani were married atop Urithiru by the Stormfather.
dalinar-and-navani-are-married.details: After the Vorin church refused to sanction Dalinar and Navani's marriage, the pair arranged a wedding officiated by the Stormfather himself atop Urithiru.

dalinar-and-sadeas-begin-joint-bridge-ru.name: Dalinar and Sadeas begin joint bridge runs
dalinar-and-sadeas-begin-joint-bridge-ru.blurb: After Sadeas cleared Dalinar's name, the two agreed to attempt joint bridge runs. The first was successful and they decided to continue.

dalinar-confronts-the-thrill-in-vedenar.name: Dalinar confronts the Thrill in Vedenar
dalinar-confronts-the-thrill-in-vedenar.blurb: While visiting Vedenar, the Thrill confronted Dalinar heavily, causing him to flee to Urithiru

dalinar-decides-to-abdicate.name: Dalinar decides to abdicate
dalinar-decides-to-abdicate.blurb: Unsure what to make of his visions and having failed to convince the Highprinces to participate in a joint plateau assault, Dalinar decided to abdicate in favor of Adolin.

dalinar-travels-to-azimir.name: Dalinar travels to Azimir
dalinar-travels-to-azimir.blurb: Dalinar travelled to Azimir and convinced the Azish to consider joining the coalition.

dalinar-visits-the-nightwatcher.name: Dalinar visits the Nightwatcher
dalinar-visits-the-nightwatcher.blurb: Dalinar visited Nightwatcher. Cultivation granted his request instead, removing all memories of Evi.

dalinar-wins-oathbringer.name: Dalinar wins Oathbringer
dalinar-wins-oathbringer.blurb: Dalinar won the Shardblade Oathbringer upon killing its previous owner, Tanalan, at Rathalas.

disadvantaged-duel.name: Disadvantaged duel
disadvantaged-duel.blurb: Adolin dueled four Shardbearers in a surprise disadvantaged duel, and was victorious with the help of Kaladin and Renarin. Kaladin was imprisoned following his demands after the duel.

elhokars-team-arrive-in-kholinar.name: Elhokar's team arrive in Kholinar
elhokars-team-arrive-in-kholinar.blurb: After camping outside the city the day before, Elhokar's team entered Kholinar under cover and met with Adolin's tailor.

eshonai-adopts-stormform.name: Eshonai adopts stormform
eshonai-adopts-stormform.blurb: After Venli's discovered and captured the correct spren, and with the blessing of the Five, Eshonai adopted stormform.

eshonai-seizes-control.name: Eshonai seizes control
eshonai-seizes-control.blurb: Eshonai seizee control of her people from the Five and began pushing for the adoption of stormform.

everstorm-countdown.name: Everstorm countdown
everstorm-countdown.blurb: Renarin began scribing a countdown to the Everstorm.

first-meeting-of-monarchs.name: First meeting of monarchs
first-meeting-of-monarchs.blurb: Navani led the first meeting of the human coalition against Odium's forces.

founding-of-the-knights-radiant-and-urit.name: Founding of the Knights Radiant and Urithiru
founding-of-the-knights-radiant-and-urit.blurb: During the Heraldic Epochs, humans began developing Nahel bonds with spren. Urithiru is constructed and the Knights Radiant were established.

gavilars-assassination.name: Gavilar's assassination
gavilars-assassination.blurb: Gavilar Kholin was assassinated by Szeth on behalf of the listeners. Highprinces swore the Vengeance Pact, and the War of Reckoning began.

jasnah-crowned.name: Jasnah crowned
jasnah-crowned.blurb: Jasnah was crowned queen of Alethkar.

jasnah-returns-from-shadesmar.name: Jasnah returns from Shadesmar
jasnah-returns-from-shadesmar.blurb: Jasnah returned from Shadesmar after meeting with the highspren and encountered Wit waiting for her.

kaladin-becomes-a-slave.name: Kaladin becomes a slave
kaladin-becomes-a-slave.blurb: Kaladin killed a Shardbearer, Helaran Davar, on the battlefield. Amaram took the Shards for himself, and branded Kaladin a slave to keep his secret.

kaladin-begins-training.name: Kaladin begins training
kaladin-begins-training.blurb: At the age of 9 Kaladin began training to be a surgeon with his father, Lirin.

kaladin-in-hearthstone.name: Kaladin in Hearthstone
kaladin-in-hearthstone.blurb: Kaladin arrived in Hearthstone and met with his family, including baby Oroden, before continuing on in search of the missing, transformed singers.

kaladin-joins-a-group-of-singers.name: Kaladin joins a group of singers
kaladin-joins-a-group-of-singers.blurb: Kaladin joined a group of singers fleeing to Revolar, initially as their prisoner.

kaladin-joins-bridge-four.name: Kaladin joins Bridge Four
kaladin-joins-bridge-four.blurb: Kaladin arrived as a slave at the Shattered Plains and was assigned by Gaz to Bridge Four.

kaladin-joins-the-army.name: Kaladin joins the army
kaladin-joins-the-army.blurb: Roshone drafted Tien into the army, and Kaladin joined to protect his younger brother.

kaladin-leaves-alethkar.name: Kaladin leaves Alethkar
kaladin-leaves-alethkar.blurb: Kaladin revealed himself as a Radiant the the singers he travelled with and returned to Urithiru during a highstorm.

kaladin-meets-highmarshal-azure.name: Kaladin meets Highmarshal Azure
kaladin-meets-highmarshal-azure.blurb: Kaladin met and joined the Wall Guard and was introduced to Highmarshal Azure.

kaladin-strung-up.name: Kaladin strung up
kaladin-strung-up.blurb: After uniting Bridge Four and attempting to protect the crew with their "side carry" maneuver, Kaladin is strung up in a highstorm.

kaladin-surgebinds.name: Kaladin Surgebinds
kaladin-surgebinds.blurb: Kaladin used Surgebinding consiously for the first time. While cosidering his new powers, he encountered Wit and heard the story of the Wandersail.

kholin-conquest-of-alethkar-begins.name: Kholin conquest of Alethkar begins
kholin-conquest-of-alethkar-begins.blurb: After working their way to the head of House Kholin, Gavilar, Dalinar, and Sadeas worked together to unite Alethkar under a monarchy.

lift-saves-gawx.name: Lift saves Gawx
lift-saves-gawx.blurb: Lift infiltrated the Bronze Palace in Azimir to steal some food. After being chased by Nale, she saved the life of Gawx and was granted immunity.

lift-saves-the-stump.name: Lift saves the Stump
lift-saves-the-stump.blurb: Lift visited Yeddaw and saved the Stump from Nale as the Everstorm arrived.

lin-davar-accused-of-murder.name: Lin Davar accused of murder
lin-davar-accused-of-murder.blurb: Redin, King Hanavanar's bastard son, accuses Lin Davar of murdering his late wife and calls for witnesses to come forward.

lurnip-famine.name: Lurnip famine
lurnip-famine.blurb: Emul was devestated by a lurnip famine. It was a pretty big deal.

meeting-with-graves.name: Meeting with Graves
meeting-with-graves.blurb: Moash convinced Kaladin to meet with Graves and hear the man's plan to assassinate King Elhokar.

moash-and-graves-attacked.name: Moash and Graves attacked
moash-and-graves-attacked.blurb: Moash and Graves' team was attacked by Fused in the Frostlands. Moash was brought to Revolar.

moash-arrives-outside-kholinar.name: Moash arrives outside Kholinar
moash-arrives-outside-kholinar.blurb: Moash's group arrived in a town on the outskirts of Kholinar where the singers are staging their seige of the city.

moash-kills-jezrien.name: Moash kills Jezrien
moash-kills-jezrien.blurb: Moash was given a strange golden dagger by the singers, which he used to assassinate the Herald Jezrien.

moash-travels-to-kholinar.name: Moash travels to Kholinar
moash-travels-to-kholinar.blurb: Moash pulled supplies to Kholinar with Sah and Khen's group

murders-in-urithiru.name: Murders in Urithiru
murders-in-urithiru.blurb: Four days after Sadeas's corpse was discovered a second body was found. Adolin was given the responsibility of investigating the murders.

oathgate-to-thaylen-city-opened.name: Oathgate to Thaylen City opened
oathgate-to-thaylen-city-opened.blurb: Dalinar convinced Queen Fen to open the Oathgate between Thaylen City and Urithiru.

odium-appears-to-dalinar.name: Odium appears to Dalinar
odium-appears-to-dalinar.blurb: While viewing a vision of the Recreance with Navani and Jasnah, Odium revealed himself to Dalinar.

re-shephir-driven-from-urithiru.name: Re-Shephir driven from Urithiru
re-shephir-driven-from-urithiru.blurb: With the help of Adolin and Bridge Four, Shallan found, confronted, and drove Re-Shephir out of Urithiru's libraries.

renarin-discovers-the-gemstone-library.name: Renarin discovers the gemstone library
renarin-discovers-the-gemstone-library.blurb: Renarin discovered the gemstones in Urithiru's library.

return-to-the-rift.name: Return to the Rift
return-to-the-rift.blurb: Dalinar burned Rathalas to the ground, killing Evi.

riinos-lighthouse.name: Riino's lighthouse
riinos-lighthouse.blurb: Kaladin, Shallan, Adolin, and Azure reached Riino's lighthouse. Kaladin had a vision suggesting Dalinar will need their aid. The group found passage to Celebrant aboard a Reacher ship.

roshars-creation.name: Roshar's Creation
roshars-creation.blurb: At some point in the distant past, Roshar was created or modified by Adonalsium.

roshone-arrives-in-hearthstone.name: Roshone arrives in Hearthstone
roshone-arrives-in-hearthstone.blurb: Exiled from Kholinar by Dalinar, Roshone arrived as citylord of Hearthstone.

rysn-in-shinovar.name: Rysn in Shinovar
rysn-in-shinovar.blurb: Rysn and Vstim traded with the Shin. Rysn was given a pot of grass to tend.

rysn-in-the-reshi-isles.name: Rysn in the Reshi Isles
rysn-in-the-reshi-isles.blurb: Rysn and Vistim traded with the Reshi. Rysn became paralyzed but was gifted a larkin.

scouring-of-aimia.name: Scouring of Aimia
scouring-of-aimia.blurb: The scouring of Aimia was a mysterious, destructive event that took place on the Rosharan island of Aimia.

shallan-and-adolin-wedding.name: Shallan and Adolin wedding
shallan-and-adolin-wedding.blurb: Shallan and Adolin were married in Urithiru.

shallan-and-kaladin-in-the-chasms.name: Shallan and Kaladin in the chasms
shallan-and-kaladin-in-the-chasms.blurb: Kaladin and Shallan fought a chasmfiend and survived a highstorm the day after sabotage during an expedition left them trapped in the chasms.

shallan-attends-the-revel.name: Shallan attends the revel
shallan-attends-the-revel.blurb: After drawing the eyes of the Cult of Moments, Shallan accepted her invitation to attend the revel.

shallan-becomes-jasnahs-ward.name: Shallan becomes Jasnah's ward
shallan-becomes-jasnahs-ward.blurb: Shallan arrived in Kharbranth and became Jasnah's ward, planning to steal the princess's Soulcaster.

shallan-confronts-jasnah.name: Shallan confronts Jasnah
shallan-confronts-jasnah.blurb: Shallan confronted Jasnah and learned the truth about Soulcasting and the Voidbringers the day after her theft was revealed while poisoned by Kabsal.

shallan-discovers-the-midnight-essence.name: Shallan discovers the Midnight Essence
shallan-discovers-the-midnight-essence.blurb: Shallan discovered the Midnight Essence while searching for secrets in the depths of Urithiru.

shallan-draws-a-cryptic.name: Shallan draws a Cryptic
shallan-draws-a-cryptic.blurb: Shallan accidentally drew a Cryptic while she and Jasnah joined Taravangian for lunch.

shallan-joins-tvlakvs-caravan.name: Shallan joins Tvlakv's caravan
shallan-joins-tvlakvs-caravan.blurb: Shallan recruited Tvlakv's caravan to take her to the Shattered Plains, after washing ashore and crossing paths with them the previous day.

shallan-kills-her-father.name: Shallan kills her father.
shallan-kills-her-father.blurb: Shallan killed her father after he killed his wife and foiled Balat's plans to run away. Lin Davar's Soulcaster is damaged.

shallan-kills-her-mother.name: Shallan kills her mother.
shallan-kills-her-mother.blurb: Shallan killed her mother with her Shardblade.

shallan-kills-tyn.name: Shallan kills Tyn
shallan-kills-tyn.blurb: Shallan used her Shardblade to kill Tyn, after her identity is discovered.

shallan-meets-ghostbloods.name: Shallan meets Ghostbloods
shallan-meets-ghostbloods.blurb: Shallan entered the warcamps and met with the Ghostbloods for the first time.

shallan-meets-taln.name: Shallan meets Taln.
shallan-meets-taln.blurb: On a mission for the Ghostbloods, Shallan met with the Herald Taln. Afterward, she is welcomed as a member of the Ghostbloods.

shallan-meets-wit.name: Shallan meets Wit
shallan-meets-wit.blurb: Shallan met Wit at the local Middlefest celebration.

shallan-recruits-deserters.name: Shallan recruits deserters
shallan-recruits-deserters.blurb: Shallan recruited several deserters, including Vathah, Gaz, and Red, and saves Tyn and her caravan from bandits.

shallan-recruits-ishnah.name: Shallan recruits Ishnah
shallan-recruits-ishnah.blurb: Shallan recruited Ishnah after the woman made several attempts to prove her value.

shallan-sees-pattern.name: Shallan sees Pattern
shallan-sees-pattern.blurb: Shallan saw Pattern the first time, and sketched a santhid.

shallan-visits-shadesmar.name: Shallan visits Shadesmar
shallan-visits-shadesmar.blurb: After drawing Cryptics again, Shallan fled to her rooms and accidentally peeked into Shadesmar while Soulcasting. She covers up her actions by cutting her wrists and his hospitalized.

shallan-visits-the-breakaway.name: Shallan visits the Breakaway
shallan-visits-the-breakaway.blurb: Shallan visited the Breakaway to help investigate the murders.

shattering-of-adonalsium.name: Shattering of Adonalsium
shattering-of-adonalsium.blurb: Adonalsium was shattered into sixteen Shards. The Shards of Honor and Cultivation settled on Roshar. Odium would follow later.

stop-in-celebrant.name: Stop in Celebrant
stop-in-celebrant.blurb: Kaladin, Shallan, Adolin, and Azure arrived in Celebrant. They spent some time purchasing supplies in the city before fleeing from the Fused aboard Honor's Path.

szeth-assassinates-hanavanar.name: Szeth assassinates Hanavanar
szeth-assassinates-hanavanar.blurb: Szeth assassinated King Hanavanar of Jah Keved, and the Veden civil war begins.

szeth-attacks-dalinar.name: Szeth attacks Dalinar
szeth-attacks-dalinar.blurb: Szeth arrived at the Shattered Plains to assassinate Dalinar, and was repelled with the help of Kaladin.

szeth-joins-the-skybreakers.name: Szeth joins the Skybreakers
szeth-joins-the-skybreakers.blurb: After months working directly with Nale, Szeth officially joined the Skybreakers.

szeth-named-truthless.name: Szeth named Truthless
szeth-named-truthless.blurb: Szeth was named Trutheless for claims concerning the return of the Voidbringers.

szeths-killing-spree-begins.name: Szeth's killing spree begins
szeths-killing-spree-begins.blurb: Szeth's oathstone was claimed by Taravangian, and the Assassin in White is commanded to assassinate several world leaders.

taln-arrives-in-kholinar.name: Taln arrives in Kholinar
taln-arrives-in-kholinar.blurb: Recently returned to Roshar, Taln arrived in Kholinar where he was awaited by Wit.

taravangian-arrives-in-urithiru.name: Taravangian arrives in Urithiru
taravangian-arrives-in-urithiru.blurb: Taravangian and his followers, including the Dustbringer Malata, arrive in Urithiru.

taravangian-crowned-king-of-jah-keved.name: Taravangian crowned king of Jah Keved
taravangian-crowned-king-of-jah-keved.blurb: Taravangian arrived in Vedenar following a deadly battle and claimed the throne. Szeth is reassured and sent to assassinate Dalinar again.

taravangian-visits-the-nightwatcher.name: Taravangian visits the Nightwatcher
taravangian-visits-the-nightwatcher.blurb: Following revelations from Gavilar, Taravangian visited the Nightwatcher and asked for "capacity to save humankind" from the coming Desolation.

the-battle-of-thaylen-field.name: The Battle of Thaylen Field
the-battle-of-thaylen-field.blurb: The Eila Stele was revealed as the coalition met in Thaylen City. The Everstorm arrived early, bringing Odium and his forces. A battle was fought and Odium is repelled when Dalinar summoned Honor's perpendicularity.

the-eightys-war.name: The Eighty's War
the-eightys-war.blurb: The Eighty's War began between Tukar and Emul.

the-false-desolation.name: The False Desolation
the-false-desolation.blurb: The so-called False Desolation was a war between humans and singers backed by the Unmade. At it's conclusion the singers become parshmen.

the-first-desolation.name: The First Desolation
the-first-desolation.blurb: War broke out between the humans, backed by Honor and Cultivation, and the native singers, backed by Odium. The cycle of Desolations began and the Oathpact was formed.

the-last-desolation.name: The Last Desolation
the-last-desolation.blurb: Nine Heralds abandoned the Oathpact. The cycle of Desolations seems to end and the Era of Solitude began.

the-last-legion.name: The Last Legion
the-last-legion.blurb: Some singers abandoned their gods, choosing dullform and fleeing into the wild, and called themselves "the listeners." They eventually settled around the Shattered Plains.

the-lesson.name: The Lesson
the-lesson.blurb: Shallan stole Jasnah's Soulcaster after Jasnah kills three thugs.

the-parshendi-discovered.name: The Parshendi discovered
the-parshendi-discovered.blurb: Gavilar and Dalinar discovered the tribe of listeners, naming them Parshendi.

the-recreance.name: The Recreance
the-recreance.blurb: After the False Desolation, most orders of the Knights Radiant disbanded, leaving behind their Shardblades and Shardplate.

the-war-of-loss.name: The War of Loss
the-war-of-loss.blurb: Sadees, the Sunmaker, ended the Vorin church's Heirocracy and united much of eastern Roshar.

trapped-in-shadesmar.name: Trapped in Shadesmar
trapped-in-shadesmar.blurb: Kaladin, Shallan, Adolin, and Azure became trapped in Shadesmar.

unification-of-alethkar.name: Unification of Alethkar
unification-of-alethkar.blurb: Gavilar's final opponents are eliminated, Dalinar & Evi were married, and Gavilar was crowned king of Alethkar.

urithiru-rediscovered.name: Urithiru rediscovered
urithiru-rediscovered.blurb: The Alethi armies escaped to Urithiru via Oathgate to flee from the Everstorm.

venli-is-claimed-by-odium.name: Venli is claimed by Odium
venli-is-claimed-by-odium.blurb: Venli's friends were taken by Fused during an Everstorm. After refusing for herself, Venli was claimed by Odium.

venli-relocated-to-marat.name: Venli relocated to Marat
venli-relocated-to-marat.blurb: After being chastised by Odium in Kholinar, Venli is brought to Marat.

vision-revelation.name: Vision revelation
vision-revelation.blurb: Navani uncovered evidence that Dalinar's visions may be real when she recognized he was speaking Dawnchant.

winds-pleasure-attacked.name: Wind's Pleasure attacked
winds-pleasure-attacked.blurb: The Wind's Pleasure was attacked by Ghostbloods. Jasnah became trapped in Shadesmar and is presumed dead. Shallan sank the ship in order to save the crew.

wistiow-dies.name: Wistiow dies
wistiow-dies.blurb: Wistiow, citylord of Hearthstone, died unexpectedly.

kharbranth.name: Kharbranth
kharbranth.details:
> Kharbranth is one of the most sheltered major cities in the world, and the bells are a symbol of that. It’s said they were first erected to warn that a highstorm was blowing, since the winds were so soft that people didn’t always notice.

Kharbranth, City of Bells, is an independent city-state on Roshar, ruled by King #[Taravangian](characters/taravangian). It is one of the five Vorin nations and home to the Palanaeum, the largest library on Roshar. Kharbranth is known for the quality of its hospitals, and people come from all over the world to study medicine from Kharbranth's surgeons. The Kharbranthian royal colors are burnt orange and white, and have become synonymous around Roshar as the colors of surgeons, medicine, and healing.

diagram.name: The Diagram
diagram.details: Bliblablub, the Diagram is an organization
